Package com.strongholds.game.net

Interface INetworkController

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
All Known Implementing Classes:
TcpServer
public interface INetworkController
extends java.lang.Runnable
Interface for simple TCP server

    Adds a new object request

    Tries to connect to the host.
    void dispose()
    Disposes server.

    • run

      void run()
      Starts the server
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      Adds a new object request
      Parameters:

    • registerController

      void registerController​(ObjectReceivedListener controller)
      Registers a new listener. This listener will be then notified every time a new object arrived.
      Parameters:
      controller -

    • setInPort

      void setInPort​(int port)
      Sets a port on which we want to receive requests.

    • setOutPort

      Sets a port on which we want to send requests.
      Parameters:
      port - output port

    • setTargetIp

      void setTargetIp​(java.lang.String ip)
      Sets an ip address of the host we want to connect to.
      Parameters:
      ip - - ip address

    • connect

      boolean connect()
      Tries to connect to the host.
      Returns:
      True on success, False when there was an error or a timeout.

    • dispose

      void dispose()
      Disposes server. Should be called before server is destroyed.
